configurable.i18n_name: "A" POCKET WITH GOLD STUDS LONG BEACH WAVE
configurable.i18n_name_de: "A" POCKET WITH GOLD STUDS LONG BEACH WAVE
configurable.i18n_name_nl: "A" POCKET WITH GOLD STUDS LONG BEACH WAVE
configurable.i18n_name_fr: "A" POCKET WITH GOLD STUDS LONG BEACH WAVE
configurable.i18n_name_it: "A" POCKET WITH GOLD STUDS LONG BEACH WAVE
configurable.i18n_name_es: "A" POCKET WITH GOLD STUDS LONG BEACH WAVE
configurable.i18n_description: The A Pocket with Gold Studs Long Beach Wave is a second-glance women’s jean to epitomise new vintage glamour. A very expensive brand’s ‘A’ Pocket fit sits comfortably on the hips and features a contoured waistband that hugs you all around. It fits slim through the thigh and extends into a wide boot leg. The stand-out ‘A’ Pocket design on the back pocket completes the look-at-me legs. Long Beach Wave is a gorgeous dark blue stretch denim that has been subtly worn in and faded, making it a cornerstone piece to put your own stamp on the glamour vintage aesthetic.
configurable.i18n_description_de: A Pocket with Gold Studs Long Beach Wave ist eine Damenjeans, die Blicke anzieht und dem Vintage-Look neuen Charme verleiht. Der ‘A’ Pocket Fit von 7FAM ist um die Hüfte bequem und hat einen konturierten Bund, der sich den Körperformen perfekt anpasst. An den Oberschenkeln schmal und nach unten weit ausgestellt. Das außergewöhnliche Design ‘A’ Pocket auf dem Backpocket macht die Beine definitiv zum Blickfang. Long Beach Wave ist ein wunderbar dunkelblauer Stretch-Denim mit gut studierten Abriebstellen und Abfärbungen: Eine unverzichtbare Jeans, wenn Sie sich für Ihren Vintage-Look einen ganz persönlichen Charme wünschen.
configurable.i18n_description_nl: De A Pocket with Gold Studs Long Beach Wave is een opvallende vrouwenjeans die nieuwe vintage glamour uitstraalt. De ‘A' Pocket van A very expensive brand zit comfortabel bij de heupen en heeft een aansluitende tailleband die je lichaam omhult. Hij sluit goed aan om het dijbeen en loopt in een wijde bootleg uit. Het opvallende ‘A’ Pocket design op de achterzak voltooit de ‘look-at-me’ beenlijn. Long Beach Wave is een prachtig donkerblauw stretchdenim dat subtiel is afgedragen en gebleekt, waardoor het een basic wordt waarmee je je eigen stempel op glamour vintage drukt.
configurable.i18n_description_fr: Le jean A Pocket version Long Beach Wave avec clous dorés est un jean femme qui incarne l'essence-même du nouveau glamour vintage. Un jean qui attirera les regards ! La coupe A Pocket de A very expensive brand repose confortablement sur les hanches et comporte une ceinture galbant la taille qui épouse les contours de votre corps. Slim au niveau des cuisses, il s'élargit ensuite pour former un bas de jambe largement évasé. Le design A Pocket distinctif sur les poches arrière complète à merveille des jambes qui accrocheront les regards. Le lavage Long Beach Wave est un superbe denim stretch bleu foncé subtilement usé et délavé qui fait de ce jean une pièce incontournable pour marquer de votre empreinte l'esthétique glamour vintage.
configurable.i18n_description_it: A Pocket with Gold Studs Long Beach Wave è un jeans da donna che richiama lo sguardo imprimendo nuovo fascino al look vintage. Il fit ‘A’ Pocket di 7FAM ha una seduta confortevole e una fascia girovita sagomata che asseconda perfettamente le forme. Veste slim sulla coscia e scende svasato. Lo straordinario design ‘A’ Pocket sulla tasca posteriore completa l’effetto irresistibile sulla gamba. Long Beach Wave è un magnifico denim blu scuro in stretch con abrasioni e scoloriture ben studiate: un pezzo irrinunciabile per imprimere un fascino tutto personale al look vintage.
configurable.i18n_description_es: The A Pocket with Gold Studs Long Beach Wave is a second-glance women’s jean to epitomise new vintage glamour. A very expensive brand’s ‘A’ Pocket fit sits comfortably on the hips and features a contoured waistband that hugs you all around. It fits slim through the thigh and extends into a wide boot leg. The stand-out ‘A’ Pocket design on the back pocket completes the look-at-me legs. Long Beach Wave is a gorgeous dark blue stretch denim that has been subtly worn in and faded, making it a cornerstone piece to put your own stamp on the glamour vintage aesthetic.

  • Zip fly
  • Made in Europe using original and handcrafted finishing techniques

configurable.i18n_product_moreaboutthefit: The "A" Pocket sits comfortably on the hips and features a contoured waistband that hugs you all around. It's slim through the thigh and extends into a wide boot leg, and features the signature "A" Pocket design on the back pockets. This fit is offered in a variety of novelty "A" Pocket designs.
configurable.i18n_product_moreaboutthefit_de:
• Die "A" Pocket sitzt bequem auf den Hüften und hat einen konturierten, figurumschmeichelnden Bund
  • der an den Oberschenkeln schmale Schnitt endet in einem weiten Bootleg
  • die Backpockets ziert das „A“-Design von 7FAM Passform erhältlich mit verschiedenen neuen „A“-Pocket-Designs
configurable.i18n_product_moreaboutthefit_nl: De "A" Pocket zit comfortabel bij de heupen en heeft een bredere broeksband om je middel volledig te stroomlijnen. De broek oogt smal dankzij de strakke pijp die uitloopt in een wijde bootleg en heeft een opvallend "A"-design op de achterzakken. Dit model is verkrijgbaar in een hele reeks vernieuwende "A" Pocket-designs.
configurable.i18n_product_moreaboutthefit_fr: Le "A" Pocket de A very expensive brand repose confortablement sur les hanches avec sa ceinture qui galbe joliment la silhouette. Slim au niveau des cuisses, il s’évase pour finir en bootcut, avec en prime sur ses poches arrière les toutes dernières déclinaisons du fameux logo « A » brodé.
configurable.i18n_product_moreaboutthefit_it: Il modello “A” Pocket è confortevole attorno ai fianchi e presenta una cintura particolarmente avvolgente per abbracciare la vita. Ha una vestibilità aderente attorno alle cosce, per poi allargarsi come un bootcut. Sulle tasche posteriori spicca la lettera “A”. Disponibile con nuovi e numerosi dettagli.
configurable.i18n_product_moreaboutthefit_es: The "A" Pocket sits comfortably on the hips and features a contoured waistband that hugs you all around. It's slim through the thigh and extends into a wide boot leg, and features the signature "A" Pocket design on the back pockets. This fit is offered in a variety of novelty "A" Pocket designs.
